title: 107_hr383
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow as a deduction, subject to limitations, an amount equal to the sum of the amount paid during the taxable year for: (1) insurance which constitutes medical care for the taxpayer and the taxpayer's spouse and dependents. Plus (2) unreimbursed prescription drug expenses paid by the taxpayer for the taxpayer and the taxpayer's spouse and dependents.
